const fetchConnections=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("https://network-back-production.up.railway.app/api/Network/list");if(response.ok){const result=await response.json();setConnections(result);}else{setStatus("Erro ao carregar conex√µes.");}}catch(error){setStatus("Erro ao conectar com a API.");}};useEffect(()=>{fetchConnections();},[]);// Fun√ß√£o para excluir uma conex√£o

border:"1px solid #ccc",borderRadius:"5px"},children:"Voltar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Conex\xF5es de Rede"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{style:{width:"100%",borderCollapse:"collapse"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Element 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Element 2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Excluir"})," "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:connections.map(connection=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{borderBottom:"1px solid #fff"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"10px",borderRight:"2px solid #fff"},children:connection.numberId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"10px",textAlign:"center"},children:connection.element1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"10px",textAlign:"center"},children:connection.element2}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"10px",textAlign:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(connection.id),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F"})})]},connection.id))})]})]});}export default Networks;
